item.description: New Hampshire Liberty Alliance Research Director Jeremy Olson will be hosting a veritable extravaganza of bill reviewing in Grafton! If you've never reviewed legislation before, and would like to, this is a great opportunity. In addition to identifying good and bad legislation, you'll learn how laws are written. Please email Jeremy at: research@nhliberty.org for directions/RSVP. Refreshments will be served!
item.name: NHLA Bill Review Session
